name: Movable Drum Pads - with Heavy Bass and Dubstep
name_original: Movable Drum Pads - with Heavy Bass and Dubstep
description:
The most excellent drum kit on the App store today!
Move these drum pads anywhere on your screen to fit your hand or your style.
Features:
* 100 different sounds
* 8 Presets with great kits already chosen
* Movable drum pads
